A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly\, the thing that made this bad movie worse for me was the Rose character.  I was going to give this movie another full star for some decent parts\, but this character was so irritating that I didn't.  When I think of the Phantom Menace\, I think mostly about how annoying Jar Jar was and what a bad actor the young Vader was.  In The Last Jedi\, we are given both of these things with Rose.  She was a totatlly useless character seemingly only there to deliver lines that will make the audience's eyes roll with how tacky they are.  I sincerely hope that she is not in the next movie or I will not buy tix for it.
